website_summaries.verdict: A large, well-made piano mat with ample features that kids love, including a realistic-looking design and roomy surface.
pros: Keyboard is durable, and resembles a real piano
At 20 x 79 inches, it's large enough for more than one child to use at a time
Plays 8 musical instruments and has 24 keys
4 modes – play, record, playback, and demo – add to the fun

customer_reviews.title: A hidden volume button might be nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my twin granddaughters who are 2. This piano has awesome sound, is pretty big, so both girls can be on it at the same time. My only wish would be that the volume control were concealed or to be able to 'lock' the volume at a certain decibel. These girls want it LOUD and gMa needs it a little quiet sometimes. It does seem durable though and they really like it alot. (I know, they are a little young for it but, I wanted to instill music early!.}
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic, means gigantic!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap. This might be the most annoying thing I’ve ever purchased. I don’t know what I was thinking and I’m sad it works so well. First of all, when they say gigantic, they mean gigantic. Secondly, I doubt you’re kids are going to be Mozart with this thing so your ears are going to bleed. Luckily, it has great volume control and you can turn it to a reasonable volume level. I’m giving it 4 stars because it works in every way it is supposed to, but the box states that you should not fold it up for storage or it can short out. Considering this thing is longer than Shaq, that’s a con. Anyway, my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable, Does not work any more, sparingly used and broke in one month
customer_reviews.text: The mat does not work anymore and we have sparingly used it. Not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 2 year old nephew for the holidays. So far we hear that he is obsessed with it, and while it may drive the parents a little crazy, it is worth it seeing his face light up when he gets to play with it. The fact that it's musical and has a large age-range of who would enjoy playing with it was a huge selling point. Great quality, no issues, many hours of entertainment, and the fact that you can record the music and play it back after is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my nephews, 1 year and 5 years. Fits the bill as something that's advanced enough for a 5 year old but doesn't have small parts that the baby could choke on. Fun for adults too! Withstood being packed up and unpacked and taken outside. Notes are not accurate (to be expected) but relative they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Can get very annoying
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old son loves this piano, me not so much. It would be perfect if the volume was easily controlled, but it is on the corner of the mat which is most likely to get stepped on by a toddler and turn to full volume. Also on the other corner is the button for playing the same time over and over again, so my son hits that and then the thing plays on repeat until I get up and go step on the button again. Highly highly annoying. The piano part is nice, I just wish they had thought through the settings better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stocking feet not recommended. Using a underlayment pad for rug to carpeting ...
customer_reviews.text: works on my medium loop carpet; thicker carpet might be an issue. It's 1 1/2 octaves. Only little feet can play the black notes; adult feet fit on the white notes. Surface is very slick; stocking feet not recommended. Using a underlayment pad for rug to carpeting helped with the mat slipping. Preset volume level is extremely loud; you have to turn it down every time. Demo method is not relevant for me. Don't know how long the batteries will last.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great size, works well but you can’t slide across it
customer_reviews.text: So the first thing I wanted to do was play Chopsticks from the movie BIG. But alas, I had to find 4 AA batteries. After that, like the reviews said, it is LOUD when you first turn it on so had to lower volume. My 3 yr old loved it. My 1.5 year old lost interest after 5 minutes and started to play with the Amazon box. Overall, it is a cute piano and good price. It’s better for 2-5 year olds in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Hello from CA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for a party
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a birthday gift and every kid at the party was lined up to get on this thing it was a hit. Easy to set up and seems to be pretty durable as dozens of hyped on on cake kids jumped all over it! Remind me not to invite so many kids to the next birthday party :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Fun musical toy with lots of options
customer_reviews.text: A two-year-old and a four-year-old have had a riot dancing up and down on this keyboard. There are many different sounds it can produce, keeping the kids enjoying themselves for lengthy periods. The sound volume is adjustable from soft to loud, and the whole thing easily folds back up for when it’s not in use. The children have fun recording and then playing back their compositions. With lots of dancing on the keys already performed, everything still works like new, so it has passed the ruggedness test. Great fun for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Rick and CarolynTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Good for children to learn that they can control and create something
customer_reviews.text: Oh, make sure to watch the Tom Hanks movie "Big" with the kid. It shows how grownups play with a much bigger version of this toy. This toy isn't very robust, but it doesn't matter because it'll last long enough for the kid to enjoy it. The best reason to encourage children to play with this toy is it helps kids experience having control of something. I love the playback feature because it reinforces what the child created. The other features are similar to those of serious digital pianos.
customer_reviews.author: Mehetabelle

customer_reviews.title: ... it for my nephew so that he could feel like Tom Hanks in BIG
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard went ABOVE AND BEYOND my expectations and of course - bought it for my nephew so that he could feel like Tom Hanks in BIG. It records beautifully and plays the song back. It is just so much fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Vartanian

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler, kiddo, and dogs stomping on this thing, and it's hanging in great. Adults even joined in at times. The piano is massive, the keys are sensitive, the volume can go way low or super high, and everyone has a blast with it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MerlinsBehalf

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a neat "Big" idea. The sound was great and surprisingly loud for the amount of batteries it took. Unfortunately, I thought it would be bigger and I should have looked at the dimensions. I just looked at the picture and the kid must have really been tiny standing next to the piano. The 3 year old girl's foot could have easily stepped on two keys rather than one
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, it's a little hard to play though
customer_reviews.text: My kids, noise makers as they are, love the mat. However, I noticed it's almost impossible to hit one key with the feet since the keys are too close together, I guess if the mat was a little bit wider giving more space it would've been perfect. Volume control is a bit annoying, I wish it would not have been "stepable". Also Record is easily hit by mistake then going back to playing is not trivial, I still haven't completely figured it out. Overall it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: sstav

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece after she watched the movie 'Big' for the first time. LOL. It is a nice size, not too big, not to small. My niece LOVES it. It allows you to play the demo, record what you play, and change the sounds of the keys to different types of instruments. My 10 month old loved rolling on the keys. It seems really durable and well made. Great fun for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyL

customer_reviews.title: Too loud and annoying
customer_reviews.text: This is super loud by default and is an annoying sound. I regret buying it. It’s put away right now till the kids forget about it so I can give it away.
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: Present of the year
customer_reviews.text: This product is very loud or very quiet the volume control on it is wonderful, we bought it for our one year old who just learned to walk so that he could make music when he runs around. It was the greatest gift not only did "he" play on it but our 3 year old and two 9-year olds and yes even the adults played on it too!
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee Owe

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: The mat IS giant, like other reviews pointed out. Awesome toy with two minor "issue" as improvement: 1. volume control, it does not remember the last volume setting and every time you open it, it is very loud and I have to press the vol-. I finally understand why other reviews want a physical volume button. 2. it is slippery when wearing socks, so you have to play it with bare foot. Easy to fall with socks on.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have to have one
customer_reviews.text: There's absolutely nothing wrong with this it's pretty neat, it has a play and record button and can play other instruments. I have a2&4 yr old (boys I might add) who are usually pretty easily entertained and they weren't with this for very long- just turned into a loud noise maker. I'd think I'd skip this toy unless your kid is obsessed with piano.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 3 year olds LOVE this! It works great, has volume control, and can play more than one note at a time. My kids love recording "songs" and playing them back. It's also very large so they each get a side when they play. I can't find anything that I would want different in this product. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Different sounds, volume control and wipeable!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids got it for Christmas and they loved it! Even us and the grandparents got in the action. Works great and love the amount of different instruments sounds and volume control lol. Great in their playroom and very easy to clean since it’s like plastic vinyl. Ive even mopped it. Even on a play date with five kids jumping on it still going strong. Fun and great gift!
customer_reviews.author: LeelooTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Won't Power On.
customer_reviews.text: Won't work. Missing connection pieces for the batteries to allow the keyboard to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk R.

customer_reviews.title: It's meh
customer_reviews.text: Kids aren't going to be able to play a tune stepping on the keys...it's just a little jumping around and there's some electric-music sounds. They used it a couple of times and now it's just collecting dust until we give it away.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: After reading through the instructions, I found it very difficult to operate the piano .Poor material.My son didnt enjoy as much as i thought he would. Very disappointed. Definitely not worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Big bear M

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I love getting my kids musical toys. They love this one bc it’s something new they hadn’t seen before. They love that that can dance & play it with their feet. The only down side is, the volume automatically turns way up when you first turn it on so don’t power it up during your baby’s nap time like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V.

customer_reviews.title: It is a toy
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is for kids and our son play with it for couple times, but it is hard to play a song due to it's size etc. There are some options, recording, play some songs, etc. My wife said return it. So, I returned it. I got it when it was for sale for around $25 or so but still we didn't keep it.
customer_reviews.author: HJM

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This piano is amazing! It works great! I had another floor piano & struggled to get the keys to sound where this one is so easy & the volume is great! It has lots of choices for instrument sounds, just overall a good product, my 2 yr old granddaughter has had a lot of fun playing with it, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it automatically starts off super loud and makes a noise every time you turn ...
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this piano toy, however it is annoyingly loud! There is no way to keep the volume either low or medium when turning it on, it automatically starts off super loud and makes a noise every time you turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Product may not be the best but a 2 year old goes crazy about having sound when he walks, sister is not that fond of it after couple of hours of nephew playing with it but she does sets it up for him to play. Feels like decent material, and not compatible with cats, they have scratched some corners, material could be sturdier, overall a cool gift for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Nava Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great & loud!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a toddler to play with and older brothers 8 &10 also very interested! The sound can be very loud and the way to turn it down isn’t on the box with the on/off switch. You have to locate it on the pad and use your foot. When a toddler is jumping around on it, they don’t realize what they are stomping on. All in all, fabulous product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Easy to Use and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality and sensitive to touch. Easy and fun for my two little ones to use. It looks exactly as pictured. This was a gift, and my son received another similar Leapfrog music mat. This one is far better, more fun and easy to use. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  WORK!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!! DOES NOT WORK! I had ordered ahead of time as a xmas present for my kids and it was past the return time when they opened it on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Keys are not calibrated to the actual pitches
customer_reviews.text: All of the 'keys' on the toy are mapped to a pitch half a step higher than the actual note. For instance, activating the C actually plays a C#. You may not notice or care, but it speaks to the overall quality of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Clement Yang

customer_reviews.title: Fun for younger children
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kids. Difficult to play songs very accurately but they have a lot of fun. Has held up very well over the last few weeks. Wish the sound was a little crisper but for a childrens toy it is nice. Like that there are different instruments to choose from as well.
customer_reviews.author: AKG007

customer_reviews.title: starts upm at max volume
customer_reviews.text: but you can turn it down. it does work, so there you go.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rood

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: good toy. even my son is lazy and don’t want to jump make songs, he keep on enjoying the music inside and sing with them. I wish he could do more exercise with this.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Defected toy
customer_reviews.text: When opened and ready to play with at a 4 year olds birthday party, we placed he proper batteries in and it turned on once we turned the switch. But nothing worked. While trying to figure it out, we noticed that it would play if you bent it a certain way. The product was delivered with a disconnected wire inside the toy. But beings we bought this more than 30 days ago, I can not return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Active Kidos
customer_reviews.text: My nephews really enjoy this giantic keyboard. They are high energy and getting them to interact with instruments usually results in something breaking. Having something like this allows for them enjoy music and be their wild selves.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: When I gave this to my 6 yo niece for ...
customer_reviews.text: When I gave this to my 6 yo niece for Christmas she immediately burst into tears because it was not a my little pony. I could not stand to get yet another Princess Twilight Sparkle or Pinkie Pie to get thrown into a pile. Her dismay was very entertaining but not nearly as entertaining as the next time I visited to find a whole crew of children jumping on the Click N' Play Gigantic Keyboard Play Mat.
customer_reviews.author: CRSX

customer_reviews.title: Huge and loud
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old grand daughter for this upcoming Christmas. It is HUGE and loud. Exactly what I hoped it would be. I am not quite sure how it will hold up with play though. The electronics that hold the batteries and run the toy seem floppy. I will update after it actually has had some play time.
customer_reviews.author: Juls B

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 2-yr old niece, but we all have loved it! It is perfect for her to play on and learn about, and it gets us all moving! Seems sturdy, and well-made. It seems like one of those gifts that she will be able to grow with and understand better with time, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Costello

customer_reviews.title: Can be a gift for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old who loves music. It is pretty loud as there is no volume control. The piano part is fine but they could have made a better product.
customer_reviews.author: vsa

customer_reviews.title: So bad
customer_reviews.text: This piano is really bad. The quality problem is serious. I bought it on the first day and it broke down. The price is expensive. It doesn’t matter if it’s good, it’s so expensive, I regret it in my heart. I always think that it’s a penny and a penny, and it’s also troublesome to return the product during the epidemic. Throw away after a day of play.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: I told my sister I was going to gift my niece the most annoying toy I could find...and I found this gem lol. This thing is huge and my niece loves it. It starts up hella loud and she was scared first but you can adjust the volume. She walks on it every day and it has held up so overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK product. Not worth the standard 80 dollars but if you can get on sale for ~20 it may be worth a try. Son was bored in like 10 minutes and never asks for it
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun for our grandchildren on Christmas. By the end of the day they learned to play a Christmas Carol. We all had fun trying it. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Judy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandniece's 1st birthday even though it was rated 3+ because of loose parts. The only loose parts are the batteries which are in a screwed down recessed cavity on the bottom. The kids ranged in age from 1 to 5 and they all had a grand time playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with it. Came a few days early than what it was supposed to. Everything works properly. I loved that you can adjust the volume level. Sound quality was great didnt sound scratchy as ive seen in a few comments people had a problem with. The keys are big enough that even my feet(SZ.8 in women) can step on them without stepping on another key. So don't worry thinking that your childs feet are too big. Very easy to fold up and store since i just put it back in the box it came in.My son has had it for about 3 months and its still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very fun “BIG” little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids ages 3 to 5 love Dancing on this giant keyboard. It’s easily rolled up to put away and it can record songs. Just a lot of fun to watch them jumping around on it as nd hearing the notes!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a super low price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My son loves it. Can be used as a "home alone" type front door alarm just leave it on and on the porch in front of the door
customer_reviews.author: The NerpS

customer_reviews.title: Can def. take a beating so don't worry about ...
customer_reviews.text: Can def. take a beating so don't worry about it "breaking" . I just wish my kid played with it more
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My niece (and my brother) love it and play with it ALL. THE. TIME. I think my sister in law might be slightly irritated with it, but the children love it. LOL (but hey, it has volume control) Seems to be of good construction. Appears durable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kids to play and get their energy level out. The item is loud and is pretty durable so far!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and she loves it. She’s played it almost every day since we received it. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Pet

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and VERY loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids and they absolutely love it, especially the two year old. My daughter isn't especially thrilled with it, but that's half the fun of being a grandparent. Plus it has a sleep mode, so when the little ones just walk away without turning it off, the batteries don't die and you get lots more loud and fun time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice interactive gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift for 3 year old granddaughter. She and the rest of the family loved it. Was a big hit with everyone!
customer_reviews.author: madkat

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this as a gift for my friends children ages 3 and 4. They absolutely loved this gift. They had a lot of fun and have played with it hours on end. It is still working after many stomps. Its a great gift idea for any kid- very simple!
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the floor piano from the movie Big!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker on this thing is garbage. Had it out for a few weeks before getting sick of looking at it. Into the garage it went, never to be seen again. Definitely not the floor piano from the movie Big!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: XMas present for My Grandchild. Loud Obnoxious and SO FUN. Especially since I leave and it stays. Wa Ha HA!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome present to inspire the love of music!  :D
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas present to my nice and nephew. They love it! :D Very happy to give a fun present that inspires the love of music!!! Awesome gift! It tempts me to buy one to play on too LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Titanium Coco

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved so much. Even our dog runs and plays on this thing. I didn’t realize it plays songs on its own and you can change instruments . Very cool. Was a Christmas gift for our 1 yr old. She would crawl across it really fast was very entertaining lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Anhaiser

customer_reviews.title: best giant keyboard ever!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this giant keyboard. I play on it with my kids(10,9 & 7). It is wonderful and I love how you can change the instruments. Well worth the low price. I highly recommend this keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly430

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective one
customer_reviews.text: Does not work out of box, tried different new batteries still no response . Returned and refunded
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Click N' Play Keyboard Mat
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love the Click N' Play Keyboard Mat. They had hours of fun especially during rainy days. They love to dance, sing and ride the tricycle over it. Very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Clarita

customer_reviews.title: Always Gift Noisy Toys To Other Households
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for someone else’s child. Update: my niece and nephew love this, and refuse to turn the volume down at all. Sure, it’s caused a bit of a familial rift, but I’m positive it will all blow over by next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: C Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year old son for rainy days He loves it! Socks are required. The plastic sticks to your feet a little but other than that it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Bossche

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nieces for Christmas and they love it. Easy to work and the volume is easily controlled so it's not too loud
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is cute but
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy but after awhile of use the volume significantly goes down even with new batteries you can't change it so that stinks, my kids can barely hear it when they play on it.
customer_reviews.author: guitarist

customer_reviews.title: ... 7 year old and the 2 year old still enjoy this 9 months later
customer_reviews.text: Both the 7 year old and the 2 year old still enjoy this 9 months later. Adults might want to invest in earplugs, as it gets to be nerve grating after the first 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Scherbina

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Educational
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old Granddaughter loves this. She got it for Christmas. Some instruments aren't accurate on tone, but it's fun & helps them learn music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole family fun
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this and it was a hit on Christmas day! to be honest the family played with it more than my nephew, and we were all jumping around on it. Not sure how I missed it but this does need batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John Morton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter's birthday. Obviously did not use it until after her birthday. Did not work out of the box. Extremely short return window so unable to even exchange.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lovegrove

customer_reviews.title: Great if you already know music!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because it comes with no playbook. Want to play a song? Better figure that out on your own!
customer_reviews.author: MistyDawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and any age-friendly. toddler to adult can step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jjm

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids can’t get enough of the keyboard. One has even learned to play a tune.
customer_reviews.author: Sharazod

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun
customer_reviews.text: So cute. My nephew is almost 2 and loved this gift for Christmas. He had a blast stomping all over it. I was really surprised at the amount of settings and functionality this gift has, especially for the price. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mess

customer_reviews.title: OK..
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but after using it 4 times, a few notes stopped playing clearly. More of some sound in between the notes. Had bought it for my grandkids to use when they came to visit and unfortunately, my return window ended before they came..
customer_reviews.author: Elise Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Dance for good exercise
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids were so excited when they opened this gift. They couldn't wait to get the batteries in and get playing. It helps them learn the notes and play music. As well as get some inside exercise as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy great tool for toddlers and older children to ...
customer_reviews.text: Can you say dancing??? Great toy great tool for toddlers and older children to play with. Keeps them occupied and appreciate music as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nasrin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend's son for Christmas and he loved it! The parents loved that you could turn the volume way down :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr. old grandson loves it. Unfortunately he has figured out the mute & volume control to his mother's dismay
customer_reviews.author: GPZ

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for Christmas and he loves it. He does interpretive dance and makes this his dance floor. It a great item for expressing his creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old love this! You can change to different instruments & even record what you are playing. Perfect size to look "big" & not clutter up too much room. My 15 year old even played with it. The kids opened this first to play with at a christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he has had a blast with it. I like that you are able to set the volume. He was able to play on it in the playroom without disturbing us in the living room. It works as described and is able to be packed up when not in use in a small space. I would definitely recommend this product for children between 4&7.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Keys are very responsive and the mat is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keys are very responsive and the mat is nice and foamy. Only requires four AA batteries
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: “You’ll hit it outta the ballpark with this gift”
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever! For toddler who loved it from day one! Day care kids love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: fritts

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids! It’s loud, fun, and just allot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Raouf

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy that had the children engaged. Too bad the control buttons at the top are positioned wrong. Kids not knowing how to read push the wrong buttons repeatedly (e.g., the "Demo" button)
customer_reviews.author: B. Amero

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun for the whole family! My 2 grands loved it and even the dogs joined in. Nice size and sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Kid Magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this keyboard. I had 3 of them on it at once and they were ecstatic about the instrument changes. I was ecstatic about the volume adjustment capabilities :)
customer_reviews.author: vacuousmoose

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start them in music!
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love it! All 3 have a blast playing it in my living room! Grandkids have just as much fun! Great way to spend the time when it's raining!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Green

customer_reviews.title: `My grandchildren had a great time playing  on this Gigantic Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This item can record and play back the notes and they really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as advertised, and delivery was nice and speedy. Batteries last forever, although being able to plug it in would be better; we taped down the edges so no one would trip over them, but since the battery compartment is accessed from the bottom we need to take it all off in order to change the batteries when they do need it. A great size for young kids, a bit fiddly for adults who want to play along but not impossible. The different instruments extend the fun, but we haven't really gotten any use out of the recording function.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it great learning tool also great way to exercise
customer_reviews.author: Mike alderman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a fun Christmas gift for my musical boys. They are 14, 13 and 11. They loved the movie Big and have had a blast with this!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Decker

customer_reviews.title: Nephews loved it so much it broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twin nephews and they had so much fun making music with their feet and trying different sounds. However, after a few months of them playing on it, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, I thought with the price it would fall apart when I opened it. Kids all played on it when it was opened at the birthday party. Very Happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Windeebyrd

customer_reviews.title: A real hit!
customer_reviews.text: Our five year old and his parents really love playing on this, particularly enjoying the variety of sound options and the ability to record their creations!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Conover

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sounds good!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase, among all gifts, the kid picked this piano. It was a great entertainment for all!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

product_meta.title: Click N' Play Gigantic Keyboard Play Mat, 24 Keys Piano Mat, 8 Selectable Musical Instruments + Play -Record -Playback -Demo-mode
product_meta.description: Music is one of the great joys of childhood, and kids that learn music are proven to do better in skills like science and math. This Click n' Play Gigantic Keyboard Play Mat makes learning music fun and exciting. You'll find that with this durable piano mat for kids, burgeoning musicians can't get enough as they experiment by stomping on loads of keys with realistic sounds! The piano mat for kids is a whopping of almost 6 feet across, and doesn't only feature piano, but lets you choose from 8 different built-in instruments, including guitar, saxophone, violin, and more! Its features allow kids to build-a-song, or just step to tap the keys and improvise music right on the spot. For those quieter home times, you can adjust the volume, and there's no worry about power running down since the floor mat keyboard includes an automatic "power off" system. The heavy duty piano mat is an ideal fun time activity for the entire family. The size of this unique keyboard mat can handle a number of kids and adults, and its heavy-duty vinyl construction means it will endure a lot of use. Inspire and enrich your child's life by giving them the Gigantic Piano Mat. This wild and fun device is a great gift for kids of any age from three and up. Four AA batteries required!.
feature_bullets: Jumbo Size! 70 x 29 inches - 24 keys. Made of heavy duty vinyl material
4 modes to select - Play, Record, Playback and Demo
8 selectable musical instrument sounds - Guitar, Piano, Clarinet, Trumpet, Saxophone, Violin, Banjo, and Xylophone
Adjustable volume. Automatic "power off" system. Touch sensitive play mat.Uses 4 x AA batteries. (not included)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
